title: roof_structure_with_removed_steel_members
summary: Roof structure observed with missing steel framing members.
description: The interior roof structure is observed with sections of steel framing removed. The image documents the current structural condition as visible at the time of capture. This record reflects a past material alteration made prior to the establishment of the current farm systems. No structural assessment or justification is included.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
